thread.title: Major blast of cold air heading our way

author: Raven Richard
title: Major blast of cold air heading our way
text:
ZIP Advertisement Major blast of cold air heading our way Temperatures expected to plummet

blast of cold air GET LOCAL BREAKING NEWS ALERTS The latest breaking updates, delivered straight to your email inbox.

Updated: 9:04 AM CST Dec 13, 2024 Raven Richard Meteorologist While we're seeing a warming trend this weekend into much of next week, the much colder air will arrive shortly after! Get ready for a blast of cold air days before Christmas! While it's still a little far away, there are early indications that Arctic air will dip down to Southeast Louisiana, dropping our temperatures below average. It could possibly be the coldest air of the season!Some models showing wind chills on the Southshore dipping below the freezing mark for Sunday, December 22. NEW ORLEANS — While we're seeing a warming trend this weekend into much of next week, the much colder air will arrive shortly after!
Get ready for a blast of cold air days before Christmas! While it's still a little far away, there are early indications that Arctic air will dip down to Southeast Louisiana, dropping our temperatures below average. It could possibly be the coldest air of the season!
